channel.title: Mark Jenkin on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Rose of Nevada’ Director Mark Jenkin on Navigating Shifting Time in a Ghostly Fishing Tale (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Authenticity is key for BAFTA-winning director Mark Jenkin, whose “Rose of Nevada” premieres in Venice Film Festival’s Horizons section Aug. 30, but all is not as it first appears. T

item.description: Authenticity is key for BAFTA-winning director Mark Jenkin, whose “Rose of Nevada” premieres in Venice Film Festival’s Horizons section Aug. 30, but all is not as it first appears. T

item.title: ‘I Saw the Face of God in the Jet Wash,’ Cornwall, Callum Turner, Truth, and Super 8 Adventures: A Chat With Mark Jenkin
item.description: The director of ‘Bait’ and ‘Enys Men’ talked about his new short, his just-delivered feature ‘Rose of Nevada,’ starring Georg MacKay and Turner, and his cinematic process in a Karlovy Vary interview.

item.title: ‘I Saw the Face of God in the Jet Wash,’ Cornwall, Callum Turner, Truth, and Super 8 Adventures: A Chat With Mark Jenkin
item.description: The director of ‘Bait’ and ‘Enys Men’ talked about his new short, his just-delivered feature ‘Rose of Nevada,’ starring Georg MacKay and Turner, and his cinematic process in a Karlovy Vary interview.
